name: Acquintance with mother
description:
One student after many years tried to find his mother. After finding he was surprised about her youth. 

He has a lot of questions for her.

But most importantly, he wanted to know why she left him after birth?

What secrets does she hide?

--------------------------------------

This short visual novel for smartphones on Android.

To read this visual novel, you need to download  on smartphone a free Player for Tyranobuilder - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yellastrodev.tyranoplayer&hl=ru.

If you liked this story, you can support a little with a few coins.
